item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 艾伦·凯：预测未来（Predicting The Future） in the user temberature at 2022-05-19T05:35:39
item.description:
in reference to:

在一些数学和科学课程中，他们经常告诉你，最好的方法是改变问题。我认为最好的方法是改变问题陈述的背景。几年前，马文·明斯基说，“你只有通过多种方式才能理解一件事。”（You don’t understand something until you understand it more than one way.）

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 阅读的未来取决于学习难学东西的未来（艾伦·凯） in the user temberature at 2022-05-19T06:06:24
item.description:
in reference to:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 4.6. 暂退法（Dropout） — 动手学深度学习 2.0.0-beta0 documentation in the user temberature at 2022-05-26T05:59:23
item.description:
in reference to:

需要说明的是，暂退法的原始论文提到了一个关于有性繁殖的类比： 神经网络过拟合与每一层都依赖于前一层激活值相关，称这种情况为“共适应性”。 作者认为，暂退法会破坏共适应性，就像有性生殖会破坏共适应的基因一样。

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 将想法送入你的轨道（Orbit） in the user temberature at 2022-06-05T05:05:35
item.description:
in reference to:

记忆：重复回忆问题；时间间隔随着回答成功/失败而呈指数级扩大/缩小 过程的流畅性：重复完成简短练习，有许多变体；时间间隔随着成功/失败而呈指数级扩大/缩小 卡片写作：重复问题、模糊的想法、主干想法，从中积累思考，时间跨度为几个月；将卡片标记为「有成果」或「无成果」，以扩大/缩小时间间隔 习惯养成：重复简短的反思卡片，可能根据顺序改变，应用于你的日常经验；间隔默认扩大，但可以放缓 阅读队列：一系列 PDF，标签页，书本，总在变换：如果一段时间内忽略某些内容，它就会暂离一周，之后是一个月；比如说「我现在读够什么了」，这东西就会几天之内再次呈现；说某个东西「不是现在读」，那就几个月，之后是几个月之后再呈现…… 电子邮件收件箱、任务队列、个人通信等

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 中医这件事 in the user temberature at 2022-06-25T14:16:37
item.description:
in reference to:

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 中医这件事 in the user temberature at 2022-06-25T14:17:45
item.description:
in reference to:

所以后来索性把医生的眼睛也蒙起来——不告诉医疗人员哪组是安慰剂组哪组是实验组，所有的结果由第三方机构去统计和评判，这就是双盲对照实验。这种测试最大限度地排除了病人的安慰剂效应和医生的主观偏好，成为了判断药物客观疗效最有力的证据，现代医学的“金标准”。

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.description:
in reference to:

From now on, my focus on “how to learn” would be shifted from “when should I review this” to “what should I do when I indeed review this?” It’ll be about thinking frameworks and mental models; it’s about “what and how to think” instead of “when to think.”

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 游牧教室的文具盒：为何真正的学习是舒适的 in the user temberature at 2022-08-17T03:15:15
item.description:
in reference to:

此时的游牧教室，几乎变成了一层套一层的叠加小宇宙。最内层是学生的头脑。包裹着它的，是我们的对话（以及白板互动）。在这一层对话之外，是我的头脑（其中有无数可能突然才想起来的事例、材料，以及数字卡片资料）。而在我的物质身体之外是书库中无数的书架。

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 教育行业已经没戏了吗？我绝不这么认为 in the user temberature at 2022-08-23T05:56:44
item.description:
in reference to:

反观美国，早在2017年就有90%的中小学实现了iPad辅助教学，纽约等州还推出了"1:1 iPad"（学生人手一台平板）的计划。此外，还有Google Chromebook这个现象级产品，仅仅2020年的发货量就达到了3000万台，其中绝大部分用于教育。在美国，大学生用Macbook、中小学生用Chromebook、大家都用iPad或Surface，早已成为司空见惯的常态。

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated r/devonthink - Is DEVONthink worth it? in the user temberature at 2022-09-01T04:02:11
item.description:
in reference to:

I suppose it depends what you want to use it for. I use it for research mainly. It is excellent for document storage and analysts and it has been a game changer for me. Coupled with its ability with RSS feeds and Devon agent, I have to say it is superb. I suspect I’m only scratching the surface of its capability. It is a pretty steep learning curve but it’s capabilities are massive.Have a look at the videos on www.screencastsonline.com there is a free membership for 7 days which should give you some idea of what it is capable of. They were a great intro for me.

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 我是如何艰难地克服「效率成瘾」的？ in the user temberature at 2022-09-02T09:16:14
item.description:
in reference to:

所以说，再举个用好重器 20% 功能的例子，对于 DEVONthink 来说，我觉得它最重要的就是 Search 搜索功能。比如说我通过 Alfred 的 DEVONthink 插件快速输入「重器轻用」，然后我就可以搜到在 DEVONthink 里面所有关于「重器轻用」的信息。而这个搜索速度是极快的，并且在右侧边栏，你可以看到搜索结果有一个展现的区域，让你快速知道哪些地方有相关文字的一个出处。

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 我是如何艰难地克服「效率成瘾」的？ in the user temberature at 2022-09-02T09:16:23
item.description:
in reference to:

其实我就能找到之前所有提到该内容的地方，而这个地方的“快”是非常重要的。我常常把 DEVONthink 比作是一栋楼当中的地下室或者是楼阁，当我们需要找什么内容的时候，我们能够非常快速地去找。虽然说平常不会去楼阁里面翻东西，但只要它搜索起来很快，你就能够快速地去找到想要的内容。

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 我是如何艰难地克服「效率成瘾」的？ in the user temberature at 2022-09-02T09:20:22
item.description:
in reference to:

另外一个机制是 P.A.R.A 中的 Archive，归档这个概念的意义其实也是非常非常重要的。就像我会把所有内容都归档到我的 DEVONthink 里面，我可以看到我所有的推文、所有的笔记，然后也可以看到我所有的网页高亮，还有我发布过的博客或者是 Newsletter 都会归档到我的 DEVONthink 里面。

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 面向白嫖(Baipiao-oriented)的DevOps：将定时更新任务扔给Github Actions去做 - 阅读清单 - 腾讯云开发者社区-腾讯云 in the user temberature at 2022-09-03T07:24:06
item.description:
in reference to:

创建好后，就等着Github Actions自己按计划调起Actions工作即可，不过根据实际测试，由于这玩意儿全球从业者估计使用的都挺多的，所以实际执行时间并不会完全按照设定的时间走，一般会晚个8-12分钟。

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated Folder Structure to Maximize Writing with Devonthink Pro — Workflows in Personal and Professional Productivity in the user temberature at 2022-09-03T14:29:11
item.description:
in reference to:

Although at one point I had all my information on manuscripts in a single DTP database, over the last year I have maintained separate databases; one for PDFs, another for my annotations.I accomplish this by having separate folders in Dropbox. After extracting my annotations from Highlights.app, I place the exported files in their own folder. Once a month, I export all the PDFs in my Paper’s Library to their own Dropbox folder. I use a Hazel script to throw away any duplicate PDFs in the Dropbox folder. I index (not import) the annotations folder into one DTP database, and index my PDFs into another.

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated dev:client coding:plugin development [Zotero Documentation] in the user temberature at 2022-09-04T17:21:59
item.description:
in reference to:

Depending on your use case, it may be easier to create an external tool that uses the Web API to access Zotero libraries, read from (not write to!) the Zotero client's SQLite database, run ad hoc JavaScript within Zotero, or interact with one of the other APIs that the Zotero client exposes (e.g., for word processor integration).

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated retrieve_pdf_metadata [Zotero Documentation] in the user temberature at 2022-09-04T17:33:59
item.description:
in reference to:

To use this feature, simply drag your existing PDFs into your Zotero library or use the “Store Copy of File” or “Link to File” options from the add new item menu (green plus sign). By default, Zotero will automatically retrieve metadata for each PDF, create an appropriate parent item, and rename the associated file based on the metadata. (You can disable these automatic functions in the General pane of Zotero preferences.)

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated retrieve_pdf_metadata [Zotero Documentation] in the user temberature at 2022-09-04T17:35:56
item.description:
in reference to:

Items and PDFs can be imported faster by using the Zotero Connector plugin in your browser from the article pages (not the PDFs) of publisher websites or most scholarly databases.

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated retrieve_pdf_metadata [Zotero Documentation] in the user temberature at 2022-09-04T17:36:32
item.description:
in reference to:

The Zotero client sends the first few pages of text from the PDF to the web service, which uses a variety of extraction algorithms and known metadata from Crossref, paired with DOI and ISBN lookups, to build a parent item for the PDF.

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 碳水化合物、蛋白质和脂肪 - 营养障碍 - 《默沙东诊疗手册大众版》 in the user temberature at 2022-11-02T09:20:58
item.description:
in reference to:

每日总热量的 50%～55% 左右应由碳水化合物构成，其中大部分来自水果、蔬菜、豆类和豆科植物以及粗粮。添加糖在每日总热量中的占比应小于 10%。

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 碳水化合物、蛋白质和脂肪 - 营养障碍 - 《默沙东诊疗手册大众版》 in the user temberature at 2022-11-02T09:25:14
item.description:
in reference to:

人体对鸡蛋中蛋白质的利用率为 100%，牛奶和肉类蛋白质利用率也同样很高。人体对大多数蔬菜和谷物中的蛋白质的利用率略低于 50%。

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 碳水化合物、蛋白质和脂肪 - 营养障碍 - 《默沙东诊疗手册大众版》 in the user temberature at 2022-11-02T09:27:38
item.description:
in reference to:

蛋白质通常不用于供应能量。然而，如果人体未从其他营养物质或体内贮存的脂肪中获得足够热量，则会将蛋白质分解为酮体以供应能量。如果蛋白质的消耗量比需要量多，那么人体就会分解蛋白质，然后以脂肪的形式贮存起来。

temberature@hypothes.is said:

temberature@hypothes.is said:

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated How to Take Smart Notes by Sonke Ahrens in the user temberature at 2022-11-10T07:07:43
item.description:

Don’t simply copy your notes into a rough draft, but translate them into something coherent and embed them into the context of your argument. As you detect any holes in your argument, fill them in, or change your argument.

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated (91 封私信 / 80 条消息) 为什么饭店的大铁锅从来都不粘锅？ - 知乎 in the user temberature at 2022-11-14T09:28:19
item.description:
in reference to:

正常饭店炒菜流程，首先预热锅，锅的温度加热到200-300度，放油，均匀涂到锅底后立即下食材，这时候油作为导热液体，迅速加热食材表面，食材表面水分剧烈沸腾，莱顿弗罗斯特效应主导，形成一层蒸汽膜，达成不粘。

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated Qt编程涉及的术语和名词 in the user temberature at 2022-12-12T16:20:43
item.description:
in reference to:

Linux/Unix 系统里静态库扩展名一般是 .a，动态库扩展名一般是 .so 。Windows 系统里 VC 编译器用的静态库扩展名一般是 .lib，动态库扩展名一般是 .dll 。

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 编写第一个Qt程序 in the user temberature at 2022-12-12T16:37:42
item.description:
in reference to:

QMainWindow 是主窗口类，主窗口具有主菜单栏、工具栏和状态栏，类似于一般的应用程序的主窗口； QWidget 是所有具有可视界面类的基类，选择 QWidget 创建的界面对各种界面组件都可以 支持； QDialog 是对话框类，可建立一个基于对话框的界面；

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 编写第一个Qt程序 in the user temberature at 2022-12-12T16:39:57
item.description:
in reference to:

在 Build 设置界面上，有一个“Shadow build” 复选框。如果勾选此项，编译后将在项目的同级目录下建立一个编译后的文件目录，目录名称包含编译器信息，这种方式一般用于使用不同编译器创建不同版本的可执行文件。如果不勾选此项，编译后将在项目的目录下建立“Debug”和“Release”子目录用于存放编译后的文件。
